transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeah, good afternoon sir, main Srishti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Sir, IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sir Srishti.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, IndiaMART se kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sir Srishti, aapke new account manager.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Yes sir, aapka concern aaya tha aapko matlab kuch services mein issue aa rahi hai, inquiries for.
Customer: Haan, puri puri issue aa rahi hai. Maine Vidhi ji ko teen baar prayas kiye, Aryan ji ko teen baar kiye. Uske baad jo Vidhi ji ke baad jo koi ladka aaya tha usko bhi ek baar kar chuka hu lekin uska koi solution mila nahi hai abhi tak.
Executive: Okay, toh sir main aapki new account manager hu, main aap sab chije handle kar rahi hu aapki jo bhi matlab dikkat aa rahi hai, thik hai? Toh sir aap video meet pe connect kar sakte hain?
Customer: Kitna time lagega?
Executive: Sir, 5 se 10 minute lagega, jyada time nahi lagega. Aapka jo bhi issue hai mujhe.
Customer: Usme kya kya karna hai? Haan, usme kya kya karna hai? Bataiye mere ko. Main teen baar toh jod chuka hu lekin kyunki mera faltu ka time hi ja raha hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Usme koi response hi mil raha hai video meet mein bhi.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Toh isliye main aapko bol raha hu ki kya kaam hai boliye aap.
Executive: Sir, ye concern tha ki matlab aapko jo bhi services mil rahi hai jaise calls, inquiry, buyleads. Toh sir kaise.
Customer: Calls inquiry koi aa nahi rahi hai, thik hai? Pehle calls inquiry koi aa nahi rahi hai. Dusra ye hai ki maine teen baar bol chuka hu ki mere bulk ki lead chahiye, chote chote quantity wali lead nahi chahiye toh woh bhi sudhara nahi hua hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Thik hai? Toh.
Customer: Aur aur aur koi response nahi milta hai. Main jab call karta hu toh usme aisa aata hai ki usme likha hua rehta hai ki onion powder ki requirement hai. Toh usko call karta hu toh woh bolta hai ki mere machine ki requirement hai.
Executive: Okay, toh sir.
Customer: Onion powder kaha se bechu mere ko samajh mein hi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha. Toh sir jaise ye sab mujhe bataiye aap isme work karte hain na, dehydrate onion powder, red onion powder.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, toh sir ye sare toh aapko matlab buylead aa hi rahe hain.
Customer: Buylead aa rahi hai, thik hai. Dekho ab kitni quantity ki aa rahi hai dekho.
Executive: Sir, Maharashtra se aayi hai.
Customer: Haan, kabhi aayi hai? Kahan se?
Executive: Sir, teen ghante pehle.
Customer: Kabhi aayi hai? Haan, toh do teen ghante mein do sort out ho gayi hogi.
Executive: No sir, isiliye toh main aapko bol rahi hu na sir, aap mere se connect karenge tabhi toh main aapko achche se samjha paungi.
Executive: Toh sir main video meet ka link share karu aapke sath?
Customer: Are madam ye aap kya bol rahe ho ki aapko jo karna hai woh aap bol rahe hain na ki bhai message dalo woh karo usko rating lo woh sab mere ko time nahi hai mere paas isliye maine IndiaMART mein premium bhara hai, thik hai?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan. Toh aapse ho sake toh karo warna main Aryan ji ko baat kar deta hu ki bhai ye koi response nahi mil raha hai mere ko.
Executive: Okay, toh sir aapki last Aadarsh sir se baat hui thi na regarding jo bhi services aapne bola ki Vidhi ji ko. Dekho Vidhi ji ko main call karta hu na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Vidhi ji ko call karta hu na toh woh bolta hai ki aapka account manager badal gaya hai. Toh kai baar ladka aata hai, kai baar ladki aati hai toh mere ko thodi na pata hai kaun mera account manager hai. Bar bar badal jata hai pure year mein ek rehna chahiye.
Executive: Haan sir, dekhiye kya hua hai. Hua ye hai ki aapke jo pehle account manager Vidhi mam dekhti thi unka promotion ho gaya hai, thik hai? Toh aapka account mere paas aa gaya hai.
Customer: Jab uska promotion hua hai tab usko batana toh tha na ki mera promotion ho gaya hai toh aap mere ko call mat kijiye dusre ko call kijiye. Usko information toh deni chahiye na.
Executive: Ji sir, unko toh deni chahiye.
Customer: Toh uska koi uska koi mail hi nahi aaya uska koi jawab hi nahi aaya toh main kya karu woh bolti hai direct abhi maine teen baar call kiya toh usne text message dal diya I'll call back you later. Toh maine call karna bhi band kar diya.
Executive: Nahi sir, aage se aisa nahi hoga aapko agar hua toh main unki taraf se maafi mangti hu, thik hai?
Customer: Nahi aisa aisa maafi ka koi issue nahi hai madam, 6 month ho gaya hai maine 30,000 dala hai maine mafat mein premium nahi liya hai, thik hai?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan toh uska koi response toh milna chahiye na.
Executive: Haan, toh sir main isiliye maine aapka profile khola hai, thik hai? Aapne request kiya matlab meeting ke liye. Toh sir maine aapka profile khola aapne bola mujhe bulk mein nahi milta. Toh main wahi sir aapko filter laga ke ye dikhana chah rahi thi ki aapko sir kahan se kaun si buylead uthana hai uthani hai, kaun si leni hai jaise sir mujhe bhi pata hai aap businessman hai aapko time nahi milta hoga ki ha review lo ye kaam karo woh kaam karo. Baat karne mein hi time nahi rehta hai toh fir sir review kaise le paoge? Toh isiliye sir main aapse ek baar video call pe connect hona chah rahi thi aapko batana chah rahi thi achche se ki sir ye buylead aapke kaam ke layak hai toh ye consume kiya kijiye.
Executive: Aur koi mera concern nahi tha.
Customer: Haan haan toh haan toh bhejiye chalo link bhej dijiye.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving calls and inquiries.

- Wants bulk leads, not small quantity leads.

- Account manager changes frequently.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Offered to show how to filter buyleads.

- Agreed to share a video meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, resolution
